locations.title: Crossgates Pool
locations.content: Crossgates Pool may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Wonderful laid-back pool with on duty lifeguards. There's a shallow end for littles, a middle part that's good for floating, and a deep end with a diving board. The facility is clean and well kept and there are bathrooms, a snack shop, a basketball hoop and tennis courts for those who want a break from the water. Great for families!

We love swimming at Crossgates Pool. It is a safe, clean, family friendly environment.  We are very thankful that we have been able to be a member, especially during these past two years. Crossgates Pool has been a life saver.

showerReviews.reviewText:
This was our second time staying here, we came to visit family for the weekend.
Staff was super friendly and hlepful as always. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The bed was so soft and cozy, we had the best sleep we've had in weeks. ‚Ä¶

Zero stars.  We arrived at 5:45pm, after a 6+ hour road trip with our two young children and were told there were no rooms ready that housekeeping was still cleaning.  When we asked how long it would be the girl said ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not housekeeping ‚Ä¶
